Container.Name: Bambuddy
Container.Overview:
Self-hosted print archive and management system for Bambu Lab 3D printers. This template follows the official docker-compose recommendations including: - host networking for discovery and camera streaming - named volumes for data + logs - bind-mounted virtual_printer certificates
Bridge mode with explicit port mapping (discovery disabled). Add printers by IP.
Container.Config: /mnt/user/appda> /mnt/user/appdata/b> <Config Name="Virtual Printer Certificates" Target="/app/data/virtual_printer" Default="/mnt/user/appdata/bambuddy/virtual_printer" Mode="rw" Description="Certificates for the Virtual Printer> Europe/Berlin
